summary: Completed comprehensive testing of HDrywall Repair platform. Backend APIs fully functional with 34/34 tests passing. Critical frontend Select component issue blocking Job Board, Shop, and Worker Profiles pages.

resolved_bugs.fix_applied: Added status_code=201 to job creation endpoint
Added status_code=201 to profile creation endpoint

critical_bugs.issue: Select.Item cannot have empty string value - breaks Job Board, Shop, and Worker Profiles pages
critical_bugs.error_message: A <Select.Item /> must have a value prop that is not an empty string
critical_bugs.suggested_fix: Remove empty string SelectItem values or use null/undefined for placeholder

working_pages.status: ✅ Fully functional with hero section, navigation, service cards
✅ Contractor registration working perfectly with redirect to dashboard
✅ Loads correctly after registration with success message
✅ All 3 tiers display correctly with subscribe buttons

passed_tests: Backend: All 34 API endpoints working (health, auth, jobs, profiles, products, cart, market-data)
Frontend: Landing page loads with hero section and service cards
Frontend: User registration (contractor) works with dashboard redirect
Frontend: Market Data page displays 3 pricing tiers correctly
Integration: Registration flow from frontend to backend working
action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix Select component empty string values in JobBoard.jsx, Shop.jsx, and WorkerProfiles.jsx. The SelectItem with value='' should be removed or changed to value={null}. This is blocking 3 major pages from loading.

success_percentage.frontend: 50% (2/4 major pages working - Landing, Registration, Market Data working; Job Board, Shop, Worker Profiles broken)
